org.microbean.helm.maven

Class GetHistoryMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • org.microbean.helm.maven.AbstractHelmMojo
        • org.microbean.helm.maven.AbstractReleaseMojo
          • org.microbean.helm.maven.AbstractSingleReleaseMojo
            • org.microbean.helm.maven.GetHistoryMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContextEnabled, Mojo

    @Mojo(name="history")
public class GetHistoryMojo
extends AbstractSingleReleaseMojo
    Retrieves the history of a release.
    Author:
    Laird Nelson

        public GetHistoryMojo()

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        protected void execute(Callable<ReleaseManager> releaseManagerCallable)
                throws Exception
        Performs a release-oriented task using a ReleaseManager available from the supplied Callable.

        This implementation retrieves the history for a given release and notifies registered ReleaseHistoryListeners.

        Specified by:
        execute in class AbstractReleaseMojo
        Parameters:
        releaseManagerCallable - the Callable that will provide a ReleaseManager; must not be null
        Throws:
        Exception - if an error occurs

      • getMax

        public int getMax()
        Returns the maximum number of history entries to retrieve.
        Returns:
        the maximum number of history entries to retrieve
        See Also:
        setMax(int)

      • setMax

        public void setMax(int max)
        Sets the maximum number of history entries to retrieve.
        Parameters:
        max - the maximum number of history entries to retrieve
        See Also:
        getMax()

      • addReleaseHistoryListener

        public void addReleaseHistoryListener(ReleaseHistoryListener listener)
        Adds a ReleaseHistoryListener that will be {@linkplain ReleaseHistoryListener#releaseHistoryRetrieved(ReleaseHistoryEvent) notified when a release history is retrieved
        Parameters:
        listener - the ReleaseHistoryListener to add; may be null in which case no action will be taken
        See Also:
        removeReleaseHistoryListener(ReleaseHistoryListener), getReleaseHistoryListenersList()

      • removeReleaseHistoryListener

        public void removeReleaseHistoryListener(ReleaseHistoryListener listener)
        Removes a ReleaseHistoryListener from this GetHistoryMojo.
        Parameters:
        listener - the ReleaseHistoryListener to remove; may be null in which case no action will be taken
        See Also:
        addReleaseHistoryListener(ReleaseHistoryListener), getReleaseHistoryListenersList()

      • getReleaseHistoryListeners

        public ReleaseHistoryListener[] getReleaseHistoryListeners()
        Invokes the getReleaseHistoryListenersList() method and converts its return value to an array.

        This method never returns null.

        Overrides of this method must not return null.

        Returns:
        a non-null array of ReleaseHistoryListeners
        See Also:
        getReleaseHistoryListenersList()

      • getReleaseHistoryListenersList

        public List<ReleaseHistoryListener> getReleaseHistoryListenersList()
        Returns the List of ReleaseHistoryListeners whose elements will be ReleaseHistoryListener#releaseHistoryRetrieved(ReleaseHistoryEvent) notified when a release history is retrieved.

        This method may return {@code null}.

        Overrides of this method are permitted to return {@code null}.

        Returns:
        a List of ReleaseHistoryListeners, or null
        See Also:
        setReleaseHistoryListenersList(List), addReleaseHistoryListener(ReleaseHistoryListener), removeReleaseHistoryListener(ReleaseHistoryListener)

      • setReleaseHistoryListenersList

        public void setReleaseHistoryListenersList(List<ReleaseHistoryListener> releaseHistoryListeners)
        Installs the List of ReleaseHistoryListeners whose elements will be notified when a release history is retrieved.
        Parameters:
        releaseHistoryListeners - the List of ReleaseHistoryListeners whose elements will be notified when a release history is retrieved; may be null
        See Also:
        getReleaseHistoryListenersList(), addReleaseHistoryListener(ReleaseHistoryListener), removeReleaseHistoryListener(ReleaseHistoryListener)
